question:
Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has 
advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day 
next summer. 
Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your letter 
• suggest how you could help her in her home 
• say why you would like to do this work 
• explain when you will and will not be available
text: This is Parham and I have seen your advertisement in a local magazine to find someone to assist you with some work at your place. I wanted to state that I will be available from the beginning of the summer. Let me explain more.

According to your ad, I would be able to help you with your garden and keep your place tidy and clean by allocating some hours during the week. Also, I have a good background in working with electronic devices and fixing them which might be practical. Although my English is not perfect, this would be a time to practice and learn more. Hence, it would be a great chance for me to improve my language skills and meanwhile help you with your errands.

Moreover, as I denoted, I will be available during the summer and specifically, I can help you during the weekdays from 3:00 to 6:00 in the evening. Please let me know if you would like me to assist you.
